title:
Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush, Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush with Pressure Sensor, Black HX3681/24, removes up to 3x more plaque vs. a manual toothbrush, signals when your 2 minutes is up,
pressure sensor to prevent gun recession, includes 1 electric toothbrush, 1 SymplyClean brush head, 1 USB charger (without wall adaptor),
descriptions:
Introducing the Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush, your ultimate solution for a superior oral care experience! This rechargeable electric toothbrush (model HX3681/24) is designed with a sleek black finish and features the advanced Sonicare technology that removes up to 3x more plaque than a manual toothbrush.

Enjoy the perfect cleaning in just 2 minutes, equivalent to a month's worth of manual brushing. The slim ergonomic design and familiar head shape ensure a comfortable grip and optimal reach to all areas of your mouth.

Equipped with cutting-edge features like the QuadPacer and SmarTimer, you'll always know the optimal time spent on each section of your mouth and never exceed the recommended 2-minute brushing time. The built-in pressure sensor helps prevent gum recession by alerting you with a flashing red indicator if you're brushing too hard. Customize your brushing experience with 2 intensity settings to suit your individual comfort.

Your Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush kit includes 1 electric toothbrush, 1 SimplyClean (C1) brush head, and 1 USB charger for easy and convenient charging (wall adapter not included). Upgrade your oral care routine today with this powerful and stylish electric toothbrush, and enjoy a healthier, more confident smile!
